name: Survivor of Eschewal
description: You suddenly wake up and find yourself on a beach of a strange island. This island does not feel right from the start because you could have swarn this island was not here the previous night. Now all you can think of is getting off this island alive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.5ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 555 1GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires 64-bit version of Windows
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 - 2.0ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 590 2GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires 64-bit version of Windows
